title: libert19
author: libert19
content: Recently, lamina1 airdropped beta tokens to active users of discord and zealy, it's claim ended yesterday but there will be new one for unclaimed tokens during this month's end, to be eligible for it criteria is same as before, be active user of discord and zealy. Zealy: https://lamina1.zealy.io/Discord: https://discord.com/invite/lamina1Discord ann (do read it): https://discord.com/channels/981694584474181654/982356860415934534/1171157432098115605I understand it's beta tokens, but they could play some role in their mainnet coin launch.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Airdrop 2.0 for redistribution of unclaimed tokens in first drop is live, details here: https://medium.com/@LAMINA1/lamina1-airdrop-2-0-what-you-need-to-know-dfd48b275ad6If you joined Lamina1 discord before dec1, you can claim this drop.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on December 02, 2023, 05:05:25 AMAirdrop 2.0 for redistribution of unclaimed tokens in first drop is live, details here: https://medium.com/@LAMINA1/lamina1-airdrop-2-0-what-you-need-to-know-dfd48b275ad6If you joined Lamina1 discord before dec1, you can claim this drop. Claim period for airdrop 2.0 will end on dec 31.You can also do quests on https://lamina1.zealy.io to earn beta tokens. Which I'm pretty sure will have something to do upon mainnet launch. Quotejoin our Quest platform on Zealy, (directions on how to join here) where you can complete Quests to earn XP that will be redeemable for more test tokens in upcoming community airdrops in Betanet and beyond.

comments.author: tokeweed
comments.body: Can we have all potential airdrops in one thread and rank them from best to worst.  I feel like many of them wouldn't be worth our time and it would be good to make everybody aware if so and leave it to the reader if he still wants to farm the airdrop.There's also another one that I've stopped participating in as I'm starting to feel it's just a waste of my time.  I'm talking about the Venom testnet.  I feel like it's a scam...  What do you guys think?

comments.author: criptoevangelista
comments.body: Quote from: tokeweed on December 27, 2023, 12:35:43 PMCan we have all potential airdrops in one thread and rank them from best to worst.  I feel like many of them wouldn't be worth our time and it would be good to make everybody aware if so and leave it to the reader if he still wants to farm the airdrop.There's also another one that I've stopped participating in as I'm starting to feel it's just a waste of my time.  I'm talking about the Venom testnet.  I feel like it's a scam...  What do you guys think?I also have this fear, it seems like airdrops are in the hype, and everything that becomes trendy exponentially increases the risk of falling for scams.I've thought about trying to participate in some, but there's so much time involved and dedicated that I'm already discouraged.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: tokeweed on December 27, 2023, 12:35:43 PMCan we have all potential airdrops in one thread and rank them from best to worst.  I feel like many of them wouldn't be worth our time and it would be good to make everybody aware if so and leave it to the reader if he still wants to farm the airdrop.I don't wanna rank them because I'm not sure about them either lol, I don't think anyone is, because it's all random state of affairs, sometimes airdrops you faded cause you thought it's not worth then it turns out big (happened to me with Jito).QuoteThere's also another one that I've stopped participating in as I'm starting to feel it's just a waste of my time.  I'm talking about the Venom testnet.  I feel like it's a scam...  What do you guys think?Venom is done, look at this [1].[1] https://talkimg.com/image/IoVMP

comments.author: tokeweed
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on December 28, 2023, 04:54:59 AMQuote from: tokeweed on December 27, 2023, 12:35:43 PMCan we have all potential airdrops in one thread and rank them from best to worst.  I feel like many of them wouldn't be worth our time and it would be good to make everybody aware if so and leave it to the reader if he still wants to farm the airdrop.I don't wanna rank them because I'm not sure about them either lol, I don't think anyone is, because it's all random state of affairs, sometimes airdrops you faded cause you thought it's not worth then it turns out big (happened to me with Jito).QuoteThere's also another one that I've stopped participating in as I'm starting to feel it's just a waste of my time.  I'm talking about the Venom testnet.  I feel like it's a scam...  What do you guys think?Venom is done, look at this [1].[1] https://talkimg.com/image/IoVMPYeah but we need to rank them to the best of out abilities and show them to everybody discuss about.  We could find the next Jito this way.  Anyway, I think one of the best ways to know if a project's airdrop could be worth it or not is if there are VC's that made a hefty investment in the project.  Who their devs are is another thing to look out for.  If the dev team is composed of guys who were part of a legit and popular procotol's core dev team then it could be worth our time.And finaly, the community...  If it's getting more traction then all the more it should go up the list.  With Venom, you just feel everything is fake and botted the moment you enter their Discord.  I left after a week.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: tokeweed on December 28, 2023, 01:40:32 PMYeah but we need to rank them to the best of out abilities and show them to everybody discuss about.  We could find the next Jito this way.  I'd leave that to the reader, I only post projects that I think are good, then it's up to the reader. I have kinda high hopes from Lamina tbh, let's see how it goes. People are free to discuss too. Quote from: tokeweed on December 28, 2023, 01:40:32 PMWith Venom, you just feel everything is fake and botted the moment you enter their Discord.  I left after a week.yep, some projects just give that vibe that they are not worth it.

comments.author: tokeweed
comments.body: ^  Maybe we could use Discord vibe as a metric if a project is worth getting into their potential airdrops.    I haven't been going around a lot in Discord and I'll be needing a few tips which ones are worth joining.So...  If you were asked which projects' Discords are worth joining to vibe with?  I joined the Worm Hole one and I know there's airdrop implications but their Discord seem a little bit botted.  Feels like I'm talking to a script.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: tokeweed on December 30, 2023, 01:15:32 PM^  Maybe we could use Discord vibe as a metric if a project is worth getting into their potential airdrops.    I haven't been going around a lot in Discord and I'll be needing a few tips which ones are worth joining.So...  If you were asked which projects' Discords are worth joining to vibe with?  I joined the Worm Hole one and I know there's airdrop implications but their Discord seem a little bit botted.  Feels like I'm talking to a script.Tough question, I'm joined in hundreds of discords, I only check few channels out of those, and that too only 'announcements', tbh there are few projects which gave airdrop for being active in discord and that's  too much mental strain to try to be active in all hoping for airdrop. Better just throw hundred dollars in project you think are good, and you'll make it. Quantity reserved for dapp users with real $ tend to exceed far more than other measures anyway.

comments.author: tokeweed
comments.body: Hundreds of Discord servers?  Lol...  Wow, I couldn't even keep up with the 11 I'm in and I'm really active to just the three of them.  But yeah, I think the community could be a good metric if the project and their airdrop could at least be a good one.  I mean look at SUI.  Before their ICO, yup it was an ICO, their Discord was full of people getting into mundane conversations which lead me to think that it was being botted.  The devs prolly picked up on this so they decided to do an ICO instead of an airdrop.I could imagine the botters' displeasure with the decision.  Lol.  They've been going at it for months thinking it was gonna be another pay day.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: tokeweed on January 02, 2024, 12:22:00 PMHundreds of Discord servers?  Lol...  Wow, I couldn't even keep up with the 11 I'm in and I'm really active to just the three of them.  But yeah, I think the community could be a good metric if the project and their airdrop could at least be a good one.  I mean look at SUI.  Before their ICO, yup it was an ICO, their Discord was full of people getting into mundane conversations which lead me to think that it was being botted.  The devs prolly picked up on this so they decided to do an ICO instead of an airdrop.I could imagine the botters' displeasure with the decision.  Lol.  They've been going at it for months thinking it was gonna be another pay day.Yep, community matters a lot. A community that's filled with 'wen moon', 'wen airdrop sir' kinda members, such projects never last.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: From Lamina1 medium: Quotenote that your activity post-drop, both on and off-chain will be used as an additional modifier for tracking your engagement for upcoming community incentives and initiatives moving forward. So, make sure to claim, test, and use them as Beta testing continues!Onchain activities you can do right now: First, get 4 betanet tokens using their discord faucet, guide here [1]. Then, go here https://hub.lamina1.com/ >> make a transfer of small amount to any address >> click at top right corner >> settings >> purchase premium username. Play spacelasers: https://hub.lamina1.com/spacelasers[1] Lamina1 quick start guide how to get l1 betanet test tokensOne more reason why I think Lamina1 will be a success is it's ticker, L1 just sounds lit to me.

comments.author: tokeweed
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on January 03, 2024, 05:09:13 AMQuote from: tokeweed on January 02, 2024, 12:22:00 PMHundreds of Discord servers?  Lol...  Wow, I couldn't even keep up with the 11 I'm in and I'm really active to just the three of them.  But yeah, I think the community could be a good metric if the project and their airdrop could at least be a good one.  I mean look at SUI.  Before their ICO, yup it was an ICO, their Discord was full of people getting into mundane conversations which lead me to think that it was being botted.  The devs prolly picked up on this so they decided to do an ICO instead of an airdrop.I could imagine the botters' displeasure with the decision.  Lol.  They've been going at it for months thinking it was gonna be another pay day.Yep, community matters a lot. A community that's filled with 'wen moon', 'wen airdrop sir' kinda members, such projects never last. Yup, no they won't.  Lol.  A good community has a cult like feeling of like minded people getting together trying to achieve a common goal.  And that's to get an allocation through an airdrop and hope to have those bags pump 100x and sell them at the pico top of the bull market.      But the last part is the unspoken goal but the real goal.  And I won'r believe it for one bit of not one of the people in the space are thinking the same thing.  :/But anyway, yeah...  A project that has a cult following behind it tends to outlast the projects that don't.  Bitcoin is the best example of this.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Lamina1 launches creator studio where you can create custom stuff, also released faucet (under #betanet-faucet channel on discord) where you can claim 10 free L1 beta tokens needed for interactions. If you don't know what you should do, just complete the quests on Lamina1 zealy, since quests are centered around released stuff: https://lamina1.zealy.io

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: If you are following Lamina1 zealy, make sure to complete quests before the deadline as mentioned below: QuoteHeads up L1 community. All Betanet Quests will be going down on the LAMINA1 Zealy page on Friday 4/26 at 11:59pm UTC.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on July 28, 2024, 12:11:44 AMLamina1 airdrop live. Follow link, connect wallet, click on airdrop tab and follow instructions: https://lamina1.com/homeTokens you claim will be locked into $LL1 and will gradually unlock to $L1, more updates to follow. Deadline to claim is Aug, 26, 2024.Feel free to claim 5 L1 tokens given to first 100k users of Lamina1 hub as well. Click relevant banner on home page to claim. Ann: https://medium.com/@LAMINA1/everything-about-L1-airdrop

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I mean Lamina1 is really being lame by locking tokens for 12 years, anyhow if you still feel like claiming, check your rewards here, if any and submit claim: https://lamina1.com/airdropQuoteAirdrop Eligibility:Anyone who has been an active member of the LAMINA1 Discord, Telegram, Hubmania Zealy campaigns and/or has had an active account (e.g. an account holding at least 1 L1 token) on https://lamina1.com since our last rewards cutoff date of April 26, 2024.Deadline to claim December 4, 2024 at 11:59pm UTC.Read complete details: https://medium.com/@LAMINA1/lamina1-hubmania-airdrop-what-you-need-to-know-b2acff6979b3
